welcome:
Welcome ${username}, we advise to divide your trading capital between different robots to maximize the diversification effect and don't borrow margin (credit) money, because cryptocurrency markets are very volatile.
All trades you make are at you own risk!
failed: ❌ Failed to process your request. Please try again later!

searchSignals.selectAsset: 🔎 Searching Signal Robots Select available ${exchange} cryptocurrency pair
searchSignals.selectRobot: 🔎 Searching Signal Robots Select available ${exchange} ${asset} robot

topSignals.selectExchange: 🏆 Top Perfomance Signal Robots Select available exchange

mySignals.robotsNone: 🚥 You are not subscribed to any signals.

perfSignals.perfNone: No enough data to calculate Signals perfomance yet...

subscribeSignals.subscribedSignals: 🚥 Succesfully subsribed to ${name} signals with volume ${volume} ${asset}!

myRobots.robotsNone: 🤖 You have not added any robots.

perfRobots.perfNone: No enough data to calculate trading Robots perfomance yet...

addUserRobot.selectExAcc:
☑️ Adding robot ${name}.

Select your ${exchange} API Key:
addUserRobot.noneExAccs:
☑️ Adding robot ${name}.

You have not registered any ${exchange} API Keys.
addUserRobot.success: ☑️ Succesfully added ${name} robot with trading volume ${volume} ${asset}!

editUserRobot.success: ⚙️ Succesfully edited ${name} robot. New trading volume ${volume} ${asset}!

deleteUserRobot.confirm: ❌ Deleting ${name} robot... ⚠️ Are you sure you want to delete ${name} robot? You will lost all your trading history for this robot.

startUserRobot.confirm: 🟢 Starting ${name} robot... ⚠️ Are you sure you want to start ${name} robot now? It is a realtime trading mode using your exchange account.

stopUserRobot.confirm: ⛔ Stopping ${name} robot... ⚠️ Are you sure you want to stop ${name} robot now? If there is any open positions created by this robot they will be canceled (closed) with current market prices and potentially may cause profit losses!

userExAccs.none: 🔑 You hasn't any Exchange API Keys yet

addUserExAcc.chooseExchange: 🔑 Adding New Exchange API Key Choose one of available exchanges:
addUserExAcc.enterAPIKey: 🔑 Adding New Exchange API Key Enter your ${exchange} API KEY
addUserExAcc.enterAPISecret: 🔑 Adding New Exchange API Key Enter your ${exchange} API Key Secret (Private Key)
addUserExAcc.check:
🔑 Adding New Exchange API Key

🌀 Checking your ${exchange} API Key...

⏳ Please wait...
addUserExAcc.failed: ❌ Failed to add new ${exchange} API Key. ${error} Please try again!

editUserExAcc.enterAPIKey: 🔑 Editing ${name} API Key Enter your ${exchange} API Key
editUserExAcc.enterAPISecret: 🔑 Editing ${name} API Key Enter your ${exchange} API Secret
editUserExAcc.failed: ❌ Failed to edit ${name} API Key. ${error} Please try again!

userExAcc.deleteFailed: ❌ Failed to delete ${name} API Key. ${error} Please try again!

robot.name: 🤖 Robot: ${name} ${subscribed}
robot.statsProfit: 💰 Profit Net Profit: ${netProfit.all} Number of Trades: ${tradesCount.all} Average Profit: ${avgNetProfit.all} Average Bars held: ${avgBarsHeld.all} Profit Factor: ${profitFactor.all} Recovery Factor: ${recoveryFactor.all} Payoff Ratio: ${payoffRatio.all} Maximum Drawdown: ${maxDrawdown.all} Maximum Drawdown Date: ${maxDrawdownDate.all}
robot.statsWinners: 🏆 Winners Win Rate: ${winRate.all} Gross Profit: ${grossProfit.all} Average Profit: ${avgProfit.all} Average Bars held: ${avgBarsHeldWinning.all} Max. Consecutive Winners: ${maxConnsecWins.all}
robot.statsLosses: 🌋 Losses Loss Rate: ${lossRate.all} Gross Loss: ${grossLoss.all} Average Loss: ${avgLoss.all} Average Bars held: ${avgBarsHeldLosing.all} Max. Consecutive Losses: ${maxConsecLosses.all}

userRobot.error: ❌ Error occurred while processing robot job ${jobType}. ${error} 🤖 ${name} (${id}) Please contact support.
userRobot.orderError: ❌ Error occurred while processing order ${exId}. ${error} 🤖 ${name} (${id}) Please check your API Keys and Robot settings or contact support.
